message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a decent chunk. Your turn to decide!
You're being too generous, I'll take more.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll take the lion's share, you can have a small consolation prize.
